amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding made available to seven undersecretaries' offices and one assistant secretary's office totaling $40,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for various programs by a total of $40,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 243 (Roll no. 300).
